Hello guys,

I've been busy for quite a while now with my game - recently deleted 3/4 of my code cause of unnecessary complicatedness - but currently stuck with obtaining the current location of the player. So, I'd like to have a command - if there is one - or to create a function which gives me the current location of the player.
So whether he is in a house or a yard, it should give me that location as a string. Can you guys help me with this?

Thanks in advance,
Frederik

Posts.EditableText: I know that if you print an expression for player.parent it will give you location of the player. If that is what you are asking? Terry Happy Adventuring
Posts.HTML: I know that if you print an expression for player.parent it will give you location of the player. If that is what you are asking? Terry Happy Adventuring

Posts.EditableText: player.parent.alias or player.parent.name returns the location as string. If you have multiple player characters you should use game.pov.parent.name
